verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
See <WH7200>, I have called <WH7121> by name <WH8034> Bezaleel <WH1212> the son <WH1121> of Uri <WH221>, the son <WH1121> of Hur <WH2354>, of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah <WH3063>:
And I have filled <WH4390> him with the spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430>, in wisdom <WH2451>, and in understanding <WH8394>, and in knowledge <WH1847>, and in all manner of workmanship <WH4399>,
To devise <WH2803> cunning works <WH4284>, to work <WH6213> in gold <WH2091>, and in silver <WH3701>, and in brass <WH5178>,
And in cutting <WH2799> of stones <WH68>, to set <WH4390> them, and in carving <WH2799> of timber <WH6086>, to work <WH6213> in all manner of workmanship <WH4399>.

And I, behold, I have given <WH5414> with him Aholiab <WH171>, the son <WH1121> of Ahisamach <WH294>, of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>: and in the hearts <WH3820> of all that are wise <WH2450> hearted <WH3820> I have put <WH5414> wisdom <WH2451>, that they may make <WH6213> all that I have commanded <WH6680> thee;

The tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and the ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715>, and the mercy seat <WH3727> that is thereupon, and all the furniture <WH3627> of the tabernacle <WH168>, furniture: Heb. vessels
And the table <WH7979> and his furniture <WH3627>, and the pure <WH2889> candlestick <WH4501> with all his furniture <WH3627>, and the altar <WH4196> of incense <WH7004>, furniture: Heb. vessels
And the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930> with all his furniture <WH3627>, and the laver <WH3595> and his foot <WH3653>, furniture: Heb. vessels

And the cloths <WH899> of service <WH8278>, and the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>, and the garments <WH899> of his sons <WH1121>, to minister in the priest's office <WH3547>,
And the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004> for the holy <WH6944> place: according to all that I have commanded <WH6680> thee shall they do <WH6213>.
And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> thou also unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, Verily <WH389> my sabbaths <WH7676> ye shall keep <WH8104>: for it is a sign <WH226> between me and you throughout your generations <WH1755>; that ye may know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068> that doth sanctify <WH6942> you.

Ye shall keep <WH8104> the sabbath <WH7676> therefore; for it is holy <WH6944> unto you: every one that defileth <WH2490> it shall surely <WH4191> be put to death <WH4191>: for whosoever doeth <WH6213> any work <WH4399> therein, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> his people <WH5971>.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> may work <WH4399> be done <WH6213>; but in the seventh <WH7637> is the sabbath <WH7676> of rest <WH7677>, holy <WH6944> to the LORD <WH3068>: whosoever doeth <WH6213> any work <WH4399> in the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>, he shall surely <WH4191> be put to death <WH4191>. holy: Heb. holiness

Wherefore the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall keep <WH8104> the sabbath <WH7676>, to observe <WH6213> the sabbath <WH7676> throughout their generations <WH1755>, for a perpetual <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>.

It is a sign <WH226> between me and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> for ever <WH5769>: for in six <WH8337> days <WH3117> the LORD <WH3068> made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>, and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> he rested <WH7673>, and was refreshed <WH5314>.

And he gave <WH5414> unto Moses <WH4872>, when he had made an end <WH3615> of communing <WH1696> with him upon mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of testimony <WH5715>, tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68>, written <WH3789> with the finger <WH676> of God <WH430>.
